content.title: Intro
content.content:
Sources

-vëa is an adjectival ending with the specific meaning "-like" in Quenya. The plural is -vië.[1]

content.title: Examples
content.content: elvëa = "starlike" (él = "star"; the long é in él becomes short before the cluster lv)[2][3]
